/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the soft glow of a clear blue sky. The sun, high in the sky, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking down the street towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
